#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int n,m,p;
	cin>>n>>m>>p;
	long long int grid[n+1][m+1];
	memset(grid,0,sizeof(grid));
	for(long long int i=0;i<p;i++)
	{
		long long int x,y;
		cin>>x>>y;
		grid[x][y]=-1;
	}
	if(grid[1][1]==-1)
	{
		cout<<"0";
		return 0;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
	{
		if(grid[1][i]==0)
		grid[1][i]=1;
		else
		break;
	
	}
	for(int j=2;j<=n;j++)
	{
		if(grid[j][1]==0)
		grid[j][1]=1;
		else
		break;
	}
	for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
	{
		for(int j=2;j<=m;j++)
		{
			if(grid[i][j]==-1)
			continue;
			if(grid[i-1][j]>0)
			grid[i][j]=(grid[i][j]+grid[i-1][j])%mod;
			if(grid[i][j-1]>0)
			grid[i][j]=(grid[i][j]+grid[i][j-1])%mod;
		}
	}
	if(grid[n][m]<0)
	grid[n][m]=0;
	cout<<grid[n][m];
	return 0;
	
	
}
